ak þata utgaggando us mann þata ist þata gamainjando mannan.
MARK 7.16 jabai ƕas habai ausona hausjandona, gahausjai.
MARK 7.17 jah þan galaiþ in gard us þizai managein, frehun ina siponjos is bi þo gajukon.
ni fraþjiþ þammei all þata utaþro inngaggando in mannan ni mag ina gamainjan:
MARK 7.19 unte ni galeiþiþ imma in hairto, ak in wamba, jah in urrunsa usgaggiþ, gahraineiþ allans matins.
MARK 7.20 qaþ-uþ-þan þatei þata us mann usgaggando þata gamaineiþ mannan.

MARK 7.21 innaþro auk us hairtin manne mitoneis ubilos usgaggand: kalkinassjus, horinassjus, maurþra, MARK 7.22 þiubja, faihufrikeins, unseleins, liutei, aglaitei, augo unsel, wajamereins, hauhhairtei, unwiti.
MARK 7.23 þo alla ubilona innaþro usgaggand jah gagamainjand mannan.
MARK 7.24 jah jainþro usstandands galaiþ in markos Twre jah Seidone jah galeiþands in gard ni wilda witan mannan jah ni mahta galaugnjan.
MARK 7.25 gahausjandei raihtis qino bi ina, þizozei habaida dauhtar ahman unhrainjana, qimandei draus du fotum is.
MARK 7.26 was-uþ-þan so qino haiþno, Saurini fwnikiska gabaurþai, jah baþ ina ei þo unhulþon uswaurpi us dauhtr izos.
MARK 7.27 iþ Iesus qaþ du izai:
let faurþis sada wairþan barna, unte ni goþ ist niman hlaib barne jah wairpan hundam.
MARK 7.28 iþ si andhof imma jah qaþ du imma:
jah auk hundos undaro biuda matjand af drauhsnom barne.
MARK 7.30 jah galeiþandei du garda seinamma bigat unhulþon usgaggana jah þo dauhtar ligandein ana ligra.
MARK 7.31 jah aftra galeiþands af markom Twre jah Seidone qam at marein Galeilaie miþ tweihnaim markom Daikapaulaios.
MARK 7.32 jah berun du imma baudana stammana jah bedun ina ei lagidedi imma handau.
MARK 7.33 jah afnimands ina af managein sundro, lagida figgrans seinans in ausona imma jah spewands attaitok tuggon is MARK 7.34 jah ussaiƕands du himina gaswogida jah qaþ du imma:
MARK 7.35 jah sunsaiw usluknodedun imma hliumans, jah andbundnoda bandi tuggons is jah rodida raihtaba.
MARK 7.36 jah anabauþ im ei mann ni qeþeina.
ƕan filu is im anabauþ, mais þamma eis meridedun MARK 7.37 jah ufarassau sildaleikidedun qiþandans:
waila allata gatawida jah baudans gataujiþ gahausjan jah unrodjandans rodjan.
MARK 8.1 In jainaim þan dagam aftra at filu managai managein wisandein jah ni habandam ƕa matidedeina, athaitands siponjans qaþuh du im:
MARK 8.2 infeinoda du þizai managein, unte ju dagans þrins miþ mis wesun jah ni haband ƕa matjaina;
MARK 8.3 jah jabai fraleta ins lausqiþrans du garda ize, ufligand ana wiga;
MARK 8.4 jah andhofun imma siponjos is:
ƕaþro þans mag ƕas gasoþjan hlaibam ana auþidai?
MARK 8.6 jah anabauþ þizai managein anakumbjan ana airþai;
jah nimands þans sibun hlaibans jah awiliudonds gabrak jah atgaf siponjam seinaim, ei atlagidedeina faur;
MARK 8.7 jah habaidedun fiskans fawans, jah þans gaþiuþjands qaþ ei atlagidedeina jah þans.
MARK 8.8 gamatidedun þan jah sadai waurþun;
jah usnemun laibos gabruko sibun spwreidans.
MARK 8.9 wesun-uþ-þan þai matjandans swe fidwor þusundjos;
MARK 8.10 jah galaiþ sunsaiw in skip miþ siponjam seinaim, jah qam ana fera Magdalan.
MARK 8.11 jah urrunnun Fareisaieis jah dugunnun miþsokjan imma sokjandans du imma taikn us himina, fraisandans ina.
